WRITING.TITLE: I #8217;m pregnant amp; scared
WRITING.TEXT: I turned 18 on the 2nd. My boyfriend is stil 17 til October. I found out I was pregnant the 29th of May. All our parents amp; him want me to have an abortion. I live with mine and don #8217;t have a job. My parents say I can stay for 6 months but they refuse to help with the baby. And I have to be completely out by November. His parents are calling and texting everyday to push me into abortion. I want my baby. I #8217;ve never really thought about pro life or pro choice. My parents are big in our church but have forbidden me from mentioning the pregnancy. I #8217;m not as religious as they are. But everyone is pushing me and I #8217;m so scared. Can I do this? I got signed up for ebt amp; medicaid. I have to send in a few forms but that #8217;s it. I called and I #8217;ll go get my wic card In a few hours. I #8217;m filling out the paperwork for low income housing right now. Update at 5:30pm There #8217;s so many comments I #8217;m having trouble replying to everyone. I just want to thank you all so much for the support. I #8217;m not terminating the pregnancy. I #8217;ve got a good start on getting us out of my parents house. If my bf doesn #8217;t want to be with us when he turns 18 that #8217;s his choice. I really want to raise this baby.
I #8217;m in Kentucky. I #8217;d really like to keep my child.

I agree. I never thought they #8217;d do this. They have talked about being pro life my whole life. They did offer to pay for me and my boyfriend to get married but he won #8217;t so this was the next choice for them
That #8217;s so inspirational. Thank you for sharing that. I #8217;m going soon to appy for whatever is available to me
I am in the us. I #8217;m in Kentucky

Thank you so much. I #8217;m scared the baby #8217;s grandparents will try to get custody. They keep saying I can #8217;t provide for it and it would be better off elsewhere if I don #8217;t abort. I #8217;ve got to get a job so I can get the things the baby will need so I can show that I #8217;m trying. I #8217;m going to appy today for food and insurance help
Thank you!!!
I #8217;m applying for government housing today #8217;s so hopefully that is fixed soon Thank you
I can do that! I have texts from my bf or maybe ex now idk asking me to abort and telling me it #8217;s the only option. That he #8217;ll leave me and I #8217;ll be homeless alone etc
He wants nothing to do with the baby

I got signed up for ebt amp; medicaid. I have to send in a few forms but that #8217;s it. I called and I #8217;ll go get my wic card In a few hours. I #8217;m filling out the paperwork for low income housing right now.
Thank you
I have thought about it but I really want to raise my baby
I sent them a message thank you so much
I #8217;m honestly not sure. I #8217;m hopeful to have an apartment soon since I applied. I put in some job applications. I guess I need to look at baby stuff

They are not the people they act like. My mom has been in a deep depression for a year or so. But no one knows it. No one is allowed in our house due to the mess because I #8217;m the only one cleaning and with 6 people here it #8217;s hard
Thank you!!
Thanks so much for this
Thank you! Makes me feel better coming from a lawyer

Tbh I #8217;m not romanticizing anything. The baby #8217;s father does not want to be with us. He told me last night that even if I had the abortion this has been too stressful for him. We broke up completely. I #8217;ve been a care taker for my siblings since they were all born. I know how hard amp; tiring babies are. But I created this baby amp; im willing to take on the responsibility of raising it. I have written out a pro/con list actually and for me, there #8217;s more cons to abortion then pros.

WRITING.TITLE: Update on my post
WRITING.TEXT: Hi there everyone. I made a post a couple weeks ago and you all were so kind! I want to thank all of you that replied and sent messages. A few went above and beyond with your kindness. So I #8217;m about 11 weeks. I #8217;m moving in with my aunt in the next little bit. She #8217;s single with a 5 year old and I #8217;ve babysit him since he was born. We get along great and she #8217;s helping me get a job. My parents are in total denial about everything. The pregnancy, me moving, me not helping them any longer. My ex boyfriend has a new girlfriend and they both act like nothing is going on and that I #8217;m a villain in their story. His parents sent one last text to say they hope I give up the baby and that their son #8217;s future is more important to them than anything. I don #8217;t want anything from those people. I #8217;m exhausted and tbh I #8217;ve been really depressed. But it #8217;s starting to get better. Again I want to thank you all for all the help and advice. It has made me feel so much better.
I #8217;m not sure. I keep thinking about it but it #8217;s such an important thing
I can #8217;t til baby is born in my state. So I #8217;m not going to worry til than. ATM he isn #8217;t working so idk if he will be in 7 months
Thank you
Thank you!

WRITING.TITLE: What #8217;s the best stroller for this situation?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi all. Due with baby in January. I very rarely go walking outdoors. I have a lot of asthma amp; the heat bothers me. Then the cold bothers me. The car the stroller would be in(which isn #8217;t mine so that might change at times depending on who we #8217;re with) is a Chevy equinox which has a decent amount of space in the trunk. I just don #8217;t know what stroller is best for pretty much just malls and maybe doctors. Do I need a big full size one or can I use the baby trend snap carrier? I keep going back amp; forth on a travel system

Id check out, https://csftl.org/ They have a Facebook page as well that you ask questions on. They have so much information about all seats. I #8217;ve been trying to do as much research as possible amp; still pregnant with first baby so I #8217;m not really any help.

WRITING.TITLE: Update on us again.
WRITING.TEXT: First post: https://www.reddit.com/r/prolife/comments/h09b16/im_pregnant_scared/?utm_source=share amp;utm_medium=ios_app amp;utm_name=iossmf I found out I #8217;m having a boy!! We are both doing really well and healthy. I #8217;m still jobless but hopefully I can change that soon or after the baby. My parents and the baby #8217;s other side including his father want nothing to do with us at all. His father didn #8217;t even care to know the gender. I am having a bit of anxiety over everything amp; making sure he has what he needs but I #8217;m happy with my choice amp; keeping him.

WRITING.TITLE: Diapers
WRITING.TEXT: What kind of diapers do you all recommend? I #8217;m going to be using disposable. And only the regular in store brands. Huggies, luvs, pampers etc. I don #8217;t have the money for the ultra expensive. Ive gotten some huggies little snuggles so far. I was thinking of using luvs mostly. How many packs or boxes per size? Should I try to get just newborn and 1s til baby is here or should I try for some of each size? I #8217;m a very young first time mom and idk what I #8217;m doing mostly.
So just as you #8217;re running low you got a pack?
Thank you! I #8217;ll keep an eye out on market place.
We don #8217;t have a costco within a few hours of us but that one thing I liked about the huggies. That band around the back seems like a good idea!
I #8217;ll keep an eye out on the fb groups. We don #8217;t have a target closet one is 90 mins away so I #8217;m nervous on trying them
Thank you! That #8217;s all very helpful. I didn #8217;t even realize some diapers are scented
I #8217;m confused by this comment?

WRITING.TITLE: What should I bring to the hospital?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi all. First time mom and not many irl to ask advice on. I #8217;m due the end of January. I have no idea what to bring to the hospital for me amp; baby? It will be just me. I #8217;ll be dropped off amp; picked up. So I can #8217;t really send someone out to grab me anything I forgot. I appreciate any advice!
America and I have no idea. I #8217;m being induced but my dr hasn #8217;t said a timeline
I #8217;m sorry I #8217;ll do that

WRITING.TITLE: Tommee Tippie bottles
WRITING.TEXT: Assuming baby takes to them etc Are the TT bottles a good choice? I #8217;m debating between them and Dr Browns. Also for someone that has to go to work at 6-8 weeks post birth. How many bottles and what sizes would be a good start? I plan on breastfeeding but have to go to work so bottles will be needed early.

Thank you so much! That #8217;s really helpful! Since I #8217;ll be alone I was hoping I could get by with a very small bag for both of us and with knowing what you used. I think that #8217;s possible
Thank you so much! That #8217;s all so helpful. My aunt will be dropping off and picking us up and the car seat will be installed in her car the whole time

Thank you! I was wondering about snacks amp; drinks. I #8217;ll be completely alone unless something big happens before Jan and I doubt that happens. I had no idea about shoes! That sounds very unpleasant. I #8217;ll bring slippers!
